backend/main.mo: Defines salon, booking, user, and image types, initializes access control and storage mixins, manages in‑memory maps, and seeds default Swiss salons.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for frontend reset and hard cutover, including involved files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of numerous frontend files detailing UI behavior, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper that renders AppV1 as the root component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Implements the full V1 UI with mock Swiss data, salon listing, creation flow, and interactive components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates a backend actor using Internet Identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing login status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, base styles, and a scrollbar-hiding utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides a helper to read a query parameter from the browser URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s reset state, minimal backend/frontend architecture, known issues, and feature metadata.
